content: everybody needs a teddy bear let s spread some kindness by making one for yourself and everyone you know the classic crochet teddy bear is the perfect gift to make for children and adults included in the pattern are the directions for making crochet eyes if you wish to eliminate using the safety eyes for young children and don t forget the optional bow tie/hair bow as well besides being someone s new best friend the classic crochet teddy bear is also perfect for gift giving and nursery decor pattern information your pdf purchase includes written instructions and pictures of the bear at various angles at the end of the pattern for optional printing the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology skills needed + the skill level needed is intermediate crochet but give it a try if you re an ambitious beginner + the techniques you will need to know are the chain single_crochet slip_stitch half_double_crochet increase invisible decrease working in the back bar of a chain and the magic_ring materials needed to complete the teddy bear you will need yarn about 230 yds of worsted/aran in your choice of colors a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook a stitch marker tapestry needle stuffing pins and safety eyes optiona finished measurements the finished teddy bear measures approximately 9 inches to the tip of the ear in the sitting position thank you thank you for supporting my small business it means the world wishing you a blessed day as you spread kindness and creativity happy crocheting this pattern along with many other designs can be found on my blog at
